The appointment reminders can be customized individually in the admin area.

Further questions? Open the support center now:
---------------------------------
{supportcenter}

testingInfo.text: Please use different end devices. If you are logged in to the login area (dashboard) and book an appointment with the same device at the same time, errors may occur. However, this only affects the sending of appointment confirmations. Therefore please do the test booking with another device with which you are not logged in to Bookingflix. Also enter a different email address when booking than the one you used when setting up the Bookingflix account. This ensures a realistic test environment.
testingInfo.title: Note for testing Bookingflix:

message.customerInfo:
Here you can enter appointments manually. Use this function if a customer books an appointment for example by phone and this appointment entry should be stored in Bookingflix.

You have two options for the manual appointment entry:

- Form
Individual appointment lengths possible. Can also be used without entering a mail address. Verification of the self-entered appointment is not necessary.

ATTENTION: Long appointment periods can block further bookings.

- Appointment calendar
Corresponds to the booking view for end customers. Can therefore only be used if a mail address is entered. Tip: Enter your account mail address if the customer does not have his own mail address. This way, the manually entered appointment can be verified by the customer himself.
message.dataProcessingContractInfo: Please contact us via support chat below. Send us your company and contact details. You will then receive your data processing contract according to DSGVO within 24 hours.
message.dateTitlePlaceholder: For retail stores and service providers: e.g. hairdressers, consultants, photo studios
message.datesDeactivatedForBookings: The following dates are currently disabled for appointment bookings
message.deletionMsg: Due to Bookingflix data deletion deadlines, appointment entries are deleted from the system on %date %count. These are old appointment entriesthat have been longer than 1 month.
message.deletionPaymentInfo: If you have a premium membership and a direct debit, please cancel it separately. Or please send an email with subject: 'Cancellation direct debit' and indication of your customer number: '{id}' to support@bookingflix.com
message.embedHint: Embed code on your own website please insert between <body> and </body>

Weihnachtsfeiertag, 2. Weihnachtsfeiertag, Silvester

message.targetPageInfo: After a successful appointment booking, a success message is automatically generated and displayed. Alternatively, you can also be redirected to an individual target page. Target pages can be set up and customized here and are ideal for additional information or photos for the upcoming appointment.
message.tipHeader: For optimal use of Bookingflix please follow these tips:
message.title: Title
message.verifyDeletion: Please enter the following to confirm the deletion:
message.verifyText: The verification of the entered contact data was successful. Below is all the info on the processing status.
message.verifyTime: Time for verification of the appointment
message.verifyTimeInfo: The appointment remains blocked (not bookable) until the booking customer has verified it or the time specified here has expired. The verification is done via link click in the verification email.
message.warningNullCalendar: No appointment calendar has been created yet. Please create an appointment calendar now.
message.webhooksInfo:
Using this feature, you can create automatic workflows for a variety of web services. This is done via a Webhook API connection.
For automation, you can choose your own workflow provider. For example Make.com, n8n.io or Zapier.com.
But also a self programmed API connection can be connected to Bookingflix's webhook.

Examples of automated workflows:

- Transfer of booking data into standard calendar (Google, Microsoft, Apple).
- Automatic creation of a video conference (Zoom, Webex, GoTo-Meeting, Google Meet, Teams) and sending the invitation to the participant who booked it
- Transfer of the appointment booking data to Excel, Numbers and Google Sheet
- Sending a mail using your own email access data.

Below are the instructions on how to connect Bookingflix with Make.com. Other services (e.g. Zapier) work similarly.
message.webhooksInfoButton: Open Make.com tutorial in new browser window
message.webinarWaitingMsg: Waiting room. The webinar has not started yet.

overview.title: Advantages of the personal appointment overview:

reminder.standard: Still %s! Confirmed date on %s. All information, cancellation / date change under %s.

startSlides.content:
We appreciate the interest in using Bookingflix.com for automatic online appointment setting.

If you have any questions, please just contact us. We are also always open for suggestions and ideas!

Supportchat: https://bookingflix.com/support-chat.html
Email: support@bookingflix.com
Privacy policy: https://bookingflix.com/privacy.html
GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS: https://bookingflix.com/terms.html
Imprint: https://bookingflix.com/imprint.html
startSlides.title: Welcome to Bookingflix!

startSlides.content:
Server in Germany, multiple backups per day, HTTPS encryption, appointment setting process already implemented according to DSGVO standard. Developed in Germany, operated in Germany.

Bookingflix is free to use for 14 days. Then you can decide if you want to continue using the premium account or if the free basic account is enough for you. There is NO automatic renewal.
startSlides.title: On the safe side with Bookingflix

startSlides.content:
Create appointment form via Quick-Start:
https://bookingflix.com/quickstart.html

Register and log in:
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard.html

Fill out profile info:
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/user/profile.html

Publish appointment form:
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/publish/all.html

Set up appointment reminders:
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/reminder/all.html

Set days off - vacations:
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/holidays.html
startSlides.title: Tips for the start

startSlides.content: Each already created appointment calendar can be edited individually. So define query fields, change texts and much more. The Quick-Start guides you through the process ... Step by step: https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/calendars/all.html
startSlides.title: Manage appointment calendar

startSlides.content:
Our gift for the start: 10 free SMS!

When an appointment is confirmed, customers receive an email AND a text message. This increases appointment reliability. Free SMS can also be used for appointment reminders. This also significantly increases appointment reliability.

Set up appointment reminders:
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/reminder/all.html

Get more SMS credits
https://bookingflix.com/dashboard/credits.html

Tip: Set up appointment reminders now and book an appointment yourself on a test basis, from the customer's perspective.
startSlides.title: 10 free SMS to test

startSlides.content:
We wish a lot of success with Bookingflix and many reliable customers.

With kind regards

Marcus Hanke

Team Bookingflix.com
Bebelstr. 15
58453 Witten
Email: support@bookingflix.com
Phone: 02302-4007736
startSlides.title: Good luck

validationError.message:
The desired appointment is not stored in the system. This can have two causes:

1. the click on the appointment confirmation was not carried out within the specified period.
2. the appointment has been deleted by the appointment manager in the meantime.
